comment: Lemma for ~ lspprat . Show that if ` X ` and ` Y ` are both in ` ( N `` { x , y } ) ` (which will be our goal for each of the two cases above), then ` ( N `` { X , Y } ) C_ U ` , contradicting the hypothesis for ` U ` . (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2014.)
